document.masterDocTitle: New country records of caddisflies (Insecta: Trichoptera) from Vietnam

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New country records of caddisflies (Insecta: Trichoptera) from Vietnam

bibRefCitation.author: Malicky, H. & P. Chantaramongkol
bibRefCitation.refString: Malicky, H., and P. Chantaramongkol. 1993 a. Neue Trichopteren aus Thailand. Teil 1: Rhyacophilidae, Hydrobiosidae, Philopotamidae, Polycentropodidae, Ecnomidae, Psychomyiidae, Arctopsychidae, Hydropsychidae (Arbeiten uber thailandische Kocherfliegen Nr. 12). Linzer Biologische Beitrage 25 (1): 433 - 487.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined :
Dac Lac :
Yok Don National Park, edge of Dak Ken River, 8 km SW Ban Don, dipterocarp forest,
12 o 53’N
,
107 o 48’E
, UV light, 15 June 1997 , B. Hubley, ROM 974101, 3 males .

Material examined :

Huong Son :
200 m
,
18 o 21’N
,
105 o 15’E
, Malaise trap ,
13 April 1998
, J. Carpenter , K. Long , D. Grimaldi , L. Herman , D. Silva , AMNH , 2 males
;
ibid.,
April - May 1998
, 1 male
;
ibid.,
11-21 May 1998
, 4 males , 1 female
.
